title: Silky Saws Outback Editions make trail work easier in cold, wet conditions
content:
The Silky Saws are already our absolute favorite portable saw thanks to their perfectly packable sizes and cuts-like-butter blades. Now, they’re even better with a new Outback Edition in three of their most popular sizes. The Silky Saw Outback Edition models use a new Arbor Composite handle that not only looks more natural, but (they […]

The post Silky Saws Outback Editions make trail work easier in cold, wet conditions appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
